short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get 'TextTranslator Plus' Chrome extension for seamless text translation on webpages. Break language barriers while browsing!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "TextTranslator Plus" is a versatile Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience by providing dynamic text translation capabilities. With this extension, you can seamlessly translate selected texts from any webpage to a language of your choice. It offers a user-friendly interface that allows you to customize both the source and target languages to suit your preferences. Simply select the text you wish to translate, and the extension will display a popup with the translation and original text side by side. The extension also keeps track of your translated texts, allowing you to review and manage your translations within the popup. "TextTranslator Plus" offers support for a wide range of languages, ensuring that you can easily understand and communicate in various contexts while browsing the web. Features:Select and translate text on any webpage with a simple click.Customize source and target languages for translations.View translated and original texts side by side in a convenient popup.Maintain a history of translated texts for easy reference.User-friendly interface with a table view for managing translations.Support for a diverse range of languages to enhance your browsing experience.By offering quick and efficient translation capabilities, "TextTranslator Plus" empowers you to break language barriers while exploring the web, making it an essential tool for global communication and understanding.
